alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester; Western Norfolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Norfolk, east central Worcester and central Middlesex Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hudson, or near Marlborough, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Locally torrential downpours can be expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Strong, erratic winds could impact the active brush fire located in Marlborough from this thunderstorm. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Framingham, Marlborough, Natick, Wellesley, Acton, Hudson, Concord, Sudbury, Northborough, Bedford, Wayland, Weston, Maynard, Southborough, Stow, Harvard, Lincoln, Boxborough, Bolton and Carlisle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
